sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Review indicator sources

Indicator sources define the set of records to evaluate when collecting indicator scores.

Indicator sources are based on a facts table, such as Incident, and may specify filter conditions to limit the included records. One indicator source can be used by multiple indicators.

Review the provided indicator sources to ensure the records you want to analyze are included. If the provided indicator sources do not meet your needs you can modify them. For example, you might adjust the filter conditions to include or exclude certain sets of records.

Typically, the indicator tracks the situation on a certain date. The conditions should include a date-related filter, such as [Opened][on][Today]. Indicators collected less frequently might specify a larger date range, such as [Closed][on][This month].
sys_embedded_help_content.name: pa_cubes_list-setup
